com.dotsandboxes.game.models

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotsandboxes.game.models.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for the presentation of the board in a given state. This board itself is presented as numbered dots from 0 to n^2-1. Each node is connected to another via an Edge.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Board.Box
      Wrapper class for the box byte model.
